name: Curiosity remains - a tale of opportunity
name_original: Curiosity remains - a tale of opportunity
description:
A game made for Games Now! online jam #2. The theme was 'Sad games'.

Travel Mars, collect samples and take photos.

Made with unity using the hdrp pipeline.

Credits:

Rover mesh & materials: NASA
Rocks: DNG_DEV
Music: Ultimate game music collection

Big thanks to Alpakka for the game idea and Games Now team for organizing the online jam during these challenging times!
